Name: Food Bank For New York City
Description: Food distribution center serving NYC’s hungry.

Name: City Harvest Food Rescue
Description: Collects surplus food and delivers it to local food pantries and shelters.

Name: Harlem Food Pantry
Description: Provides nutritious food to residents in Harlem.

Name: St. John’s Bread and Life
Description: A community food pantry offering groceries and hot meals.

Name: BronxWorks
Description: Food pantry and community kitchen providing meals to Bronx residents.

Name: God’s Love We Deliver
Description: Delivers nutritious, medically tailored meals to people living with serious illness.

Name: Loaves & Fishes Food Pantry
Description: Provides food for families in need in the East Village.

Name: New York City Rescue Mission
Description: Provides meals and emergency shelter for homeless individuals.

Name: Red Hook Initiative
Description: A food pantry offering free meals and groceries to community members in need.

Name: United Jewish Council of the East Side
Description: Provides food, meals, and groceries for low-income families in the Lower East Side.
